txt.en: Maelvír has asked you to bring back shells from the dread-turtles inhabiting a nearby island.\n\nYou can hunt dread-turtles on the island of Loeg Thangalf, in Pinnath Gelin.
'Welcome back, welcome back! Ah, do you have them? Oof, you certainly smell like you do.'
With multiple dread-turtle shells in hand, you should return to Maelvír.\n\nMaelvír is at Mereham, in central Pinnath Gelin.

'Hello, hello! Ooh, a [placeholder]. Most excellent! You're just who I need!\n\n'Ah, let me explain. I am Maelvír - armourer for the Knights of the Green Hills. I heard that dread-turtles have moved onto the nearby island of Loeg Thangalf. Isn't it exciting? That is, you see, I am very interested in learning more about their armoured shells. Bring some back, and I shall reward you. What do you say?'
The island of Loeg Thangalf has become home to ferocious dread-turtles, whose shells may well serve to provide protection and armour for the Knights of the Green Hills.
'Welcome back, welcome back! Ah, do you have them? Oof, you certainly smell like you do.'
